channel.title: SHH:600276 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in SHH:600276 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hengrui’s Obesity Drug Rivals Zepbound in Late-Stage China Trial
item.description: Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co. and its US partner said their obesity drug candidate succeeded in a late-stage China study, a key step toward securing approval as domestic biotech firms increasing
